title: Development of a Metadata Model-Based Science Learning Design Tool

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Graduate-level course on developing learning design tools in science, operated in a mobile-based microlearning environment. Learners experience selecting appropriate methods, tools, activities, and assessment elements based on learning objectives.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design science-based learning activities using a metadata model.
Learners can generate executable learning design documents based on the IMS-LD standard.
Learners can develop assessment strategies optimized for mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
